translation.en: You!
You've got enough spark in you left to walk.
translation.es: Te queda suficiente chispa para caminar.

translation.en: - On your feet. - No.
I'm not supposed be here. There's a mistake. It's a mistake!
translation.es: No debería estar aquí. Es un error. - ¡Es un error! - Tú eres el único error aquí.

translation.en: You're the only mistake I see here.
translation.es: - ¡Es un error! - Tú eres el único error aquí.

translation.en: Time for the arena.
translation.es: Llegó la hora de la arena.

translation.en: No. No one ever comes back from there.
translation.es: No. Nadie nunca vuelve de allí.

translation.en: I… I shouldn't be here.
I'm a loyal Decep--
- - Move!
Auto… Autobots?
Decepticons?
Imprisoning their own?
Open it.
I said, open it.
You're free.
All of you, go.
Go!
Since my days working in the mines,
translation.es: Desde que trabajaba en las minas

translation.en: to my rise from the arena,
translation.es: y mi ascenso en la arena

translation.en: to my revolution I have fought…
I fought for Cybertron.
I have pushed us forward.
And now I ask myself…
For what?
Because of Prime,
we are marooned on a dying world,
translation.es: quedamos abandonados en un mundo agonizante,

translation.en: waiting as death slowly surrounds us.
translation.es: esperando la muerte que lentamente nos va rodeando.

translation.en: And now I am forced to do the unimaginable.
translation.es: Y ahora me veo obligado a hacer lo impensado.

translation.en: The arrogant fool destroyed himself,
translation.es: El tonto arrogante se destruyó a sí mismo,

translation.en: the Autobots,
and, tragically, the Allspark.
His stubbornness has condemned us all.
translation.es: Su terquedad nos condenó a todos.

translation.en: But you understand more than anyone.
translation.es: Pero tú entiendes más que nadie.

translation.en: What?
Lord Megatron, Shockwave requests your presence.
translation.es: Mi señor Megatron, Shockwave solicita su presencia.

translation.en: I'll be right there.
You'll have to excuse me, Magnus.
As you know,
duty waits for no one.
translation.es: el deber no espera a nadie.

translation.en: What is it, Shockwave?
Lord Megatron,
Section 12 has fallen below satisfactory output.
translation.es: la producción del sector 12 está por debajo del nivel satisfactorio.

translation.en: What section hasn't?
translation.es: ¿Hay alguna sección que no lo esté?

translation.en: Need I remind you?
At our current rate of power consumption,
translation.es: Al ritmo de consumo energético actual,

translation.en: we approach dire--
Yes, yes.
Grave.
I suggest we take Section 12 offline
and recycle their resources for Project Nemesis.
translation.es: y reciclemos sus recursos para el Proyecto Némesis.

translation.en: Another sector already?
They are no longer manufacturing at a satisfactory rate.
translation.es: Ya no están produciendo a un ritmo satisfactorio.

translation.en: And you feel Sector 12 will prove more useful to us
translation.es: ¿Y a ti te parece que el sector 12 nos resultará más útil

translation.en: in other capacities?
It is logical.
Although, time is of the essence.
I'll let you know what I decide.
Until then, do not take Sector 12 offline.
translation.es: Hasta entonces, no desconectes el sector 12.

translation.en: As you wish, Lord Megatron.
Elita…
can we speak for a moment?
I didn't want to question you in front of the others,
translation.es: No fue mi intención cuestionarte frente a los demás,

translation.en: but earlier, the prison camp…
translation.es: pero en el centro de detención…

translation.en: Are you sure we should be freeing Decepticons?
translation.es: ¿Estás segura de que deberíamos liberar Decepticons?

translation.en: I'm not entirely sure of that answer myself.
translation.es: Ni yo misma estoy segura de la respuesta a esa pregunta.

translation.en: But I have an even better question for you.
translation.es: Pero tengo una pregunta incluso mejor para ti.

translation.en: Why are the Decepticons imprisoning their own kind?
translation.es: ¿Por qué los Decepticons están encarcelando a los suyos?

translation.en: The Decepticons have never taken very good care of their own.
translation.es: Los Decepticons nunca cuidaron a sus propios miembros.

translation.en: True… but something's changed.
Since the Battle of the Spacebridge,
translation.es: Desde la batalla del puente espacial,

translation.en: everything's changed, including Megatron.
He would never have allowed that before.
translation.es: Él nunca habría permitido eso antes.

translation.en: The Decepticons thrive on war.
translation.es: Los Decepticons prosperan cuando están en guerra.

translation.en: For Megatron to survive, he needs an enemy.
translation.es: Para sobrevivir, Megatron necesita un enemigo.

translation.en: The Autobots are all but killed off now, so he's turned on his own.
translation.es: Los Autobots se han ido, así que ahora ataca a los suyos.

translation.en: If Megatron's locking up Decepticons, let him!
translation.es: Si Megatron está encerrando Decepticons, déjalo.

translation.en: We should be focused on freeing only Autobots.
translation.es: Deberíamos enfocarnos en liberar solo a los Autobots.

translation.en: They're citizens and they're Cybertronian!
We can't lose sight of that!
translation.es: No podemos perder eso de vista.

translation.en: I'm not saying we have to murder them.
translation.es: No digo que tengamos que asesinarlos,

translation.en: We just shouldn't risk our sparks
and what little resources we have to help them.
translation.es: y nuestros escasos recursos por ayudarlos.

translation.en: Freedom is the right of all sentient beings.
translation.es: La libertad es el derecho de todos los seres que sienten.

translation.en: Normally, I'd agree,
but every single Decepticon we free
is just another Decepticon on the battlefield aiming to take us out.
translation.es: es otro Decepticon que nos querrá derribar en el campo de batalla.

translation.en: We have to show them a better way, Jetfire.
The planet's almost dead. This entire sector's been powered down.
translation.es: El planeta está prácticamente muerto. Han desconectado todo este sector.

translation.en: We're outnumbered one hundred to one!
translation.es: Nos superan en número cien a uno.

translation.en: The odds are against us as it is.
And yet, we'll continue to liberate the prison camps
translation.es: Y seguiremos vaciando los centros de detención

translation.en: and free anyone we find,
translation.es: y liberando a todos los que encontremos

translation.en: because we're Autobots
and that's what we do.
translation.es: y eso es lo que hacemos.

translation.en: I've voiced my concern.
Elita…
I… just received intel from Steeljaw.
translation.es: acabo de recibir información de Steeljaw.

translation.en: If this is correct,
he's infiltrated one of the largest prison camps we've seen.
translation.es: se infiltró en uno de los centros de detención más grandes que conozcamos.

translation.en: Jetfire's not wrong.
We take a huge risk
every time we blast into one of these places.
translation.es: cada vez que irrumpimos en uno de esos lugares.

translation.en: If any of us were locked up…
translation.es: Si encerraran a alguno de nosotros…

translation.en: There would be no one left to free us.
Chromia, the camp is deep in Kaon,
translation.es: Chromia, el centro está en lo profundo de Kaon.

translation.en: so plan accordingly.
Red Alert…
Prep for survivors.
I'm on it.
- Thundercracker, report! -
We've hacked into what's left of Steeljaw and transmitted the bait.
translation.es: Hackeamos los restos de Steeljaw y transmitimos la carnada.

translation.en: - Excellent. - We'll be ready for them.
Soon, thanks to me,
the Autobot raids on our detention centers
translation.es: los ataques de los Autobots a nuestros centros de detención

translation.en: will come to a swift end.
Or should I say,
a swift and brutal end?
You two see that?
- Is that…? - It couldn't be.
He… he came to see us?
Lord Megatron! Here! We… We can't believe it.
translation.es: ¡Nuestro señor Megatron! ¡Aquí! No lo podemos creer.

translation.en: Welcome! We're so lucky to have you here.
translation.es: ¡Bienvenido! Somos muy afortunados por su visita.

translation.en: The mighty Megatron, here in Sector 12.
translation.es: El gran Megatron, aquí, en el sector 12.

translation.en: I'm always here for all my… - I can't believe it. - …loyal Decepticons.
translation.es: Siempre estoy aquí para mis Decepticons leales.

translation.en: Uh, let me give you a tour.
I'll show you around, Lord Megatron.
translation.es: Le enseñaré el lugar, mi señor Megatron.

translation.en: Very few guards for such a large camp.
translation.es: Hay muy pocos guardias para semejante centro.

translation.en: I don't like it.
I can't remember a time when you came upon a Decepticon base you did like--
translation.es: No recuerdo que hayas ido a una base Decepticon que te gustara…

translation.en: - Shh! - Sorry.
- I agree with Chromia. - It seems too quiet down there.
translation.es: Concuerdo con Chromia. Hay muy poco movimiento allí abajo.

translation.en: Hmm. Could be a trap.
- Should we continue? - Chromia?
Your job is to make the tough choices.
translation.es: Tomar decisiones difíciles es tu trabajo.

translation.en: My job is to shoot when you say shoot.
translation.es: Mi trabajo es disparar cuando dices dispara.

translation.en: OK then… - Shoot! -
Shortly after the Battle of the Spacebridge,
translation.es: Poco después de la batalla del puente espacial,

translation.en: we shut down production on quagma cannons
translation.es: paramos la producción de cañones de quagma

translation.en: and put our efforts into recycling munitions for blasters.
translation.es: y nos concentramos en el reciclaje de munición para blásteres.

translation.en: And what is the output?
We're at 22 percent,
but as soon as a troop rotation goes through
translation.es: pero apenas se concrete la rotación de tropas

translation.en: and supply flow is worked out,
translation.es: y se resuelva el flujo de suministros,

translation.en: we… we'll be operating at twice the capacity.
Uh… Megatron… can I just tell you?
I remember when you were a champion in the arena.
translation.es: Recuerdo cuando usted era campeón en la arena.

translation.en: Those fights were so exciting.
Even back then, I knew you were the one to follow.
translation.es: Incluso allí, yo sabía que usted era el líder que debía seguir.

translation.en: No matter what, you can count on us, Lord Megatron.
translation.es: Pase lo que pase, cuente con nosotros, mi señor Megatron.

translation.en: Spoken… like a true Decepticon.
translation.es: Hablas como un Decepticon de verdad.

translation.en: Tell me, how many are stationed here now?
Hmm.  Twenty and… Uh, fifty- seven, sir!
- - Excuse me.
Uh, yes, sir. Uh, yes, Lord Megatron.
translation.es: Sí, señor. Sí, mi señor Megatron.

translation.en: I'm curious, Lord Megatron.
translation.es: Pregunto por curiosidad, mi señor Megatron.

translation.en: Your signal indicates that you are in Sector 12--
translation.es: Su señal indica que se encuentra en el sector 12…

translation.en: I haven't made my decision yet.
translation.es: Aún no he tomado mi decisión.

translation.en: Need I remind you?
We require the resources of Sector 12
to keep Project Nemesis on schedule.
translation.es: para que el Proyecto Némesis marche según lo previsto.

translation.en: You'll have an answer on Sector 12 when I'm ready to give it!
translation.es: ¡Tendrás mi respuesta sobre el sector 12 cuando esté listo para dártela!

translation.en: And need I remind you, Shockwave,
just who is in charge?
Yes, Lord Mega--
Sh-- Should we continue your tour, Lord Megatron?
translation.es: ¿Continuamos con su recorrido, mi señor Megatron?

translation.en: Proceed.
With just a few upgrades,
we could be one of the top munitions producers for the Decepticon war effort!
translation.es: podríamos ser un gran productor de munición para la guerra Decepticon.

translation.en: What's down there in that section?
translation.es: ¿Qué hay en esa sección allí abajo?

translation.en: Uh, not much to see.  Uh, just the infirmary.
translation.es: No hay mucho para ver. Solo la enfermería.

translation.en: Show me.
Yes, sir. Right away.
Over there!
You OK?
Yeah.
- - You?
Yeah. - Let's get inside before-- -
How much of your workforce is debilitated?
Uh, 92 percent.
But those of us on our feet gladly make up for it.
translation.es: Pero los que estamos de pie compensamos con mucho gusto.

translation.en: I've seen enough.
I'm so glad someone on our team can fly!
translation.es: ¡Cuánto me alegra que uno de nosotros pueda volar!

translation.en: Happy you could make it, Jetfire.
translation.es: - Nos alegra que vinieras, Jetfire. - ¡Nos alegra mucho!

translation.en: Like, super happy. You have no idea.
translation.es: - Nos alegra que vinieras, Jetfire. - ¡Nos alegra mucho! Ni te lo imaginas.

translation.en: Good call having me wait up there for the Seekers.
translation.es: Hiciste bien en mandarme a esperar a los Buscadores allí arriba.

translation.en: See, Jetfire? I have my moments.
There's bound to be more inside.
Autobots, stay alert.
I'm always alert.
Keep moving.
We want to be in and out before more guards show up.
translation.es: Hay que entrar y salir antes de que vengan más guardias.

translation.en: What's with all the empty cells?
translation.es: Hay que entrar y salir antes de que vengan más guardias. ¿Y estas celdas vacías?

translation.en: I was wondering the same thing.  I'm getting a faint Autobot signal.
translation.es: - Me pregunto lo mismo. - Detecto una señal Autobot débil.

translation.en: - - It looks to be… this way.
Time is of the essence.
Red Alert, see if there's another way around.
I'm on it!
Shockwave.
Yes, Lord Megatron?
Take Sector 12 offline.
Affirmative.
This is it.
So noble…
and predictable.
What's the status of Project Nemesis?
The harvest is on schedule.
translation.es: La cosecha marcha según lo planeado.

translation.en: Thanks to our forces from Sector 12,
translation.es: Gracias a nuestras fuerzas del sector 12,

translation.en: Project Nemesis will be a success.
translation.es: el Proyecto Némesis será un éxito.

translation.en: There are times I envy your lack of emotion.
translation.es: Hay veces que envidio tu falta de sentimientos.

translation.en: Deletion of my emotions was the most logical choice
translation.es: La eliminación de mis sentimientos fue la opción más lógica

translation.en: to increase my efficiency.
Just as harvesting ineffective Decepticons
and turning their sparks into energy
translation.es: y transformar sus chispas en energía

translation.en: is the most logical choice for our survival.
translation.es: es la opción más lógica para nuestra supervivencia.

translation.en: There was a time
when this arena was a symbol of Decepticon greatness.
translation.es: en la que esta arena era un símbolo de la grandeza Decepticon.

translation.en: Now it is a symbol of Decepticon ingenuity
translation.es: Ahora es un símbolo del ingenio Decepticon

translation.en: in the face of extinction.
That may be so.
Lord Megatron!
Your preeminent warrior has returned with quite the prize.
translation.es: Su guerrero preeminente ha regresado con un gran botín.

translation.en: Autobots?
Elita- 1…
and all that remains of Prime's Autobots.
translation.es: y todo lo que queda de los Autobots de Prime.

translation.en: Starscream, for once, I am impressed.
translation.es: Starscream, esta vez sí que me impresionaste.

translation.en: You've caused much trouble since the Battle of the Spacebridge.
translation.es: Has causado muchos problemas desde la batalla del puente espacial.

translation.en: Perhaps you should have been the leader of the Autobots.
translation.es: Quizá tú tendrías que haber sido la líder de los Autobots.

translation.en: I might have been inspired enough to follow you myself.
translation.es: Quizá hasta a mí me habrías inspirado para seguirte.

translation.en: You wouldn't have made the team.
Instead,
you surround yourself with traitors
like your valiant leader who destroyed our world.
translation.es: como tu valiente líder, que destruyó nuestro mundo.

translation.en: Your war is what destroyed Cybertron.
translation.es: Tu guerra es lo que destruyó Cybertron.

translation.en: Hmm. Keep telling yourself that.
And you!
A traitor not even worthy of my acknowledgment.
translation.es: Un traidor que ni siquiera es digno de mi reconocimiento.

translation.en: Let me dispose of him, Lord Megatron.
- No. - But I can kill--
I said no!
Jetfire will still prove useful to us.
- Shockwave, proceed. -
What… is this?
This is what is necessary
for Cybertron's survival.
No!
I am loyal!
I'm a loyal Decepticon!
Do it.
How… How can you do this?
I'm not the one doing this!
This is the horror forced upon me by your noble leader!
translation.es: ¡Este es el horror al que me obligó a recurrir tu noble líder!

translation.en: This is the reality Prime left for all of us!
translation.es: ¡Esta es la realidad que Prime nos dejó a todos!

translation.en: Murdering your own kind… for energon?
translation.es: ¿Asesinas a tus propios seguidores por energon?

translation.en: Your concern for my people is needless.
translation.es: Tu preocupación por mi gente es innecesaria.

translation.en: The next harvest will be powered
by four Autobot sparks.
- Take them away. - Yes, Lord Megatron.
What, or should I say,
who do we have here?
